pullrequest.title: User scaling commands are properly logged and played back

content.raw:
I'll be picking this up soon.

Just for the record, the quickest way to reproduce the issue is:

1. Scale some shapes

1. Save the world

1. Reload the world - the scale will be applied twice.

This is happening because when we save we modify the shape's size. So now with states, the scale ends up being applied twice.
